item.title: 一次灾难性收购暴露了私募股权交易中的模糊数学
item.description:
一桩价值数十亿美元的交易转眼间化为乌有，这对急于为公司收购注入现金的投资者来说是一个警示。【原文：

A billion-dollar deal went bust in a blink, a cautionary tale for investors eager to pump cash into company buyouts.

】

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper 持有者 JAB 要求以 24 亿美元收购股权
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，JAB 控股公司正在寻求以高达 24 亿美元的价格收购 Keurig Dr. Pepper Inc.【原文：JAB Holding Co. is seeking as much as $2.4 billion for a 5.4% stake in Keurig Dr. Pepper Inc., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达发布乐观预测，表明人工智能发展势头强劲
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）对本季度的收入预测看涨，向投资者保证人工智能计算方面的支出依然强劲。【原文：Nvidia Corp. gave a bullish revenue forecast for the current quarter, reassuring investors that spending on artificial intelligence computing remains strong.】

item.title: 聚焦人工智能应用，Snowflake 销售前景强劲
item.description: 雪花公司（Snowflake Inc）预计本财年的收入增长将好于预期，对其最近推出的人工智能产品的应用发出了乐观的信号。该公司股价在延时交易中跳涨。【原文：Snowflake Inc. projected better-than-expected revenue growth for the fiscal year, sending an optimistic signal about the adoption of its recently launched products for artificial intelligence. The shares jumped in extended trading.】

item.title: EBay 预计本期销售额不及预期，业绩下滑
item.description: EBay Inc. 预计本季度的销售额低于分析师的预期，这表明购物者在不断寻找电子商务先驱的替代品。【原文：EBay Inc. projected sales for the current quarter that missed analysts’ estimates, suggesting shoppers keep finding alternatives to the e-commerce pioneer.】

item.title: 加拿大 3,300 亿美元基金将缩减 PE 直接投资规模
item.description: 加拿大养老金管理公司 Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec 在投资私募股权时将更多地依靠合作伙伴和第三方管理公司，但仍以直接投资者为主。【原文：Canadian pension manager Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec will lean more on partners and third-party managers when investing in private equity, but remain primarily a direct investor.】

item.title: Salesforce 增长前景不温不火，人工智能代理希望破灭
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 公布的财年营收预期低于预期，这使人们对该公司新推出的人工智能产品的乐观情绪有所减弱。【原文：Salesforce Inc. gave a fiscal-year revenue forecast that fell short of estimates, dimming optimism for the company’s new artificial intelligence product.】

item.title: 中国量化专家称 DeepSeek 之后基金必须采用人工智能才能生存
item.description: 业内最积极的人工智能用户之一表示，DeepSeek 的成功正在加大对中国量化对冲基金的压力，迫使它们拥抱人工智能，否则就有可能被淘汰。【原文：DeepSeek’s success is intensifying pressure on China’s quantitative hedge funds to embrace artificial intelligence or risk becoming obsolete, according to one of the most aggressive users of AI in the industry.】

item.title: 隐形轰炸机航空零部件制造商 SpaceX 申请破产
item.description: Dynamic Aerostructures 公司为美国战斗机、SpaceX 和蓝色起源公司的航天器制造专用零部件，该公司已申请破产，计划在法院监督下进行拍卖。【原文：Dynamic Aerostructures, which makes specialized parts for US fighter jets and SpaceX and Blue Origin spacecraft, filed for bankruptcy with plans to sell itself at a court-supervised auction.】

item.title: 对中国征收关税对美国经济的危害可能比数据显示的更大
item.description: 新的研究表明，唐纳德-特朗普总统最近对从中国进口商品征收的关税对美国经济的打击可能会超过美国官方贸易数据所显示的程度。【原文：New research suggests President Donald Trump’s latest tariffs on imports from China could hit the American economy more than official US trade data indicate.】

item.title: 英伟达今天发布的第四季度财报分析
item.description: Nvidia Blackwell GPU 芯片。摄影师：Akio Kon/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A Nvidia Blackwell GPU chip. Photographer: Akio Kon/Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本金融高官称市场对日本央行的看法没有问题
item.description: 日本最高货币官员周三表示，他对市场日益增长的日本央行加息预期没有异议，本周加息帮助日元升至四个月高点。【原文：Japan’s top currency official on Wednesday indicated he had no issue with growing market expectations over Bank of Japan interest-rate hikes, which this week helped send the yen to a four-month high.】

item.title: Ben & Jerry's 创始人讨论从联合利华手中买回品牌
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Ben & Jerry's 的创始人已表示有兴趣从联合利华公司手中买回他们的同名冰淇淋品牌。【原文：The founders of Ben & Jerry’s have expressed interest in buying back their namesake ice cream brand from Unilever Plc, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 初创公司在中国黑客忧虑中关注安全芯片
item.description: 初创公司在中国黑客忧虑中关注安全芯片【原文：Startup Eyes Secure Chips Amid China Hacking Worries】

item.title: 特朗普吊销委内瑞拉石油许可证，打击马杜罗政权
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他计划吊销委内瑞拉的石油经营许可证，理由是该国未能按照承诺尽快将移民遣返回美国。【原文：President Donald Trump said he plans to revoke an oil license to operate in Venezuela, citing the country’s failure to take back migrants to the US as quickly as it promised.】

item.title: 阿根廷允许活牛出口，米莱废除 1973 年政策
item.description: 随着哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统推动放松对经济的管制，世界上最大的牛肉出口国之一阿根廷现在将可以把牛送到国外屠宰。【原文：Argentina, one of the world’s top beef exporters, will now be able to send its cattle abroad for slaughter as President Javier Milei pushes to deregulate the economy.】

item.description:

item.title: Alphabet 旗下谷歌裁减云计算部门员工
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司周三裁减了云计算部门的员工。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google on Wednesday cut staffers in its cloud division, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克的前推特员工因 "岔路口 "邮件赢得解雇费
item.description: 推特前员工在对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）于 2022 年收购推特公司时实施的大规模裁员提出的法律挑战中取得了早期胜利。【原文：Former Twitter employees are scoring early victories in legal challenges to Elon Musk’s mass layoffs when he bought the company in 2022.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁引发全球竞相将铜运往美国
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对铜征收进口关税，这为全球顶级大宗商品贸易商创造了巨大的获利机会，他们急于将铜从遥远的亚洲运往美国。【原文：The world’s top commodity traders are rushing to ship copper to the US from as far afield as Asia as Donald Trump’s threat of import tariffs on the metal creates a huge opportunity for profit.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 一天内遭遇创纪录的 10 亿美元资金外流
item.description: 周二，投资者从现货比特币交易所交易基金中撤资超过 10 亿美元，创下自去年 1 月比特币上市以来最大单日流出量。【原文：Investors yanked more than $1 billion from spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds Tuesday, marking the biggest one-day outflow since the cohort’s debut last January.】

item.title: 特朗普在全球关税的时间和范围上制造混乱
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三就其对加拿大、墨西哥和欧盟征收关税的计划给出了一系列明显自相矛盾的回答。【原文：President Donald Trump on Wednesday gave a series of apparently contradictory answers about his plans to enact tariffs on Canada and Mexico, as well as the European Union.】

item.title: 比特币期权显示交易者正在对冲跌至 70,000 美元的风险
item.description: 随着所谓的 "特朗普冲击 "在市场上逐渐消退，比特币期权显示，投资者和交易商正在对冲加密货币跌至大选日后水平的风险。【原文：With the so-called Trump bump fading across markets, Bitcoin options are showing that investors and traders are hedging against a decline in the cryptocurrency to levels last seen just after election day.】

item.title: 特朗普推迟关税后，墨西哥比索和加拿大元获得提振
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推迟了对来自墨西哥和加拿大的商品征税的最后期限后，墨西哥比索和加拿大元受到提振。【原文：Mexico’s peso and Canada’s dollar got a boost after US President Donald Trump pushed back the deadline for levies on goods from both countries.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称利率需保持在限制性范围内
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，美国央行应将利率维持在一个能继续对通胀构成下行压力的水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said the US central bank should hold interest rates where they are, at a level that continues to put downward pressure on inflation.】

item.title: 费城联储调查显示，美国工人对裁员的担忧与日俱增
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行的一项最新调查显示，近三分之一的美国工人担心被雇主解雇，这一比例在过去六个月中大幅上升。【原文：Almost one-third of US workers are concerned about getting laid off by their employers, a share that’s risen significantly over the past six months, according to a new Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia survey.】

item.title: 财政部任命顾问帮助规划美国主权财富基金
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）任命了一位华尔街和军界的资深人士为主权财富基金计划提供建议，朝着实现唐纳德-特朗普总统关于美国加入拥有主权财富基金的国家行列的想法又迈进了一步。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent named a Wall Street and military veteran to advise on plans for a sovereign wealth fund, taking a further step toward fulfilling President Donald Trump’s idea for the US to join the ranks of nations with such assets.】

item.title: 法拉利控股公司 Exor 出价收购豪华汽车制造商 4% 的股份
item.description: Exor NV 出价收购豪华汽车制造商法拉利公司 4% 的股份。【原文：Exor NV is offering a 4% stake in luxury carmaker Ferrari NV.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 正在洽谈投资莱昂纳多航空结构部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在洽谈对莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）航空结构部门的投资，这笔交易将使海湾国家在一个关键的工业领域获得更多的投资机会。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in talks to invest in Leonardo SpA’s aerostructures unit, according to people familiar with the matter, in a deal that would give the Gulf state greater exposure to a key industrial segment.】

item.title: 维托尔首席执行官称，对欧洲来说，零净排放可能是一个代价太高的目标
item.description: 全球最大的独立石油贸易商负责人表示，欧洲各国政府应该实事求是地考虑消费者和工业界因追求严格的净零排放目标而付出的代价。【原文：European governments should be realistic about the costs to consumers and industry from pursuing strict net-zero emissions goals, according to the head of the world’s biggest independent oil trader.】
